Windlord::

Windlord in robot mode had landed among Darkangel and teltoli, his 
metalic and sharped feathers were ready to destroy this menace. In 
fact he had more reasurces to face him

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, steph_teltoli@m... wrote:
> 'I wonder if Carnage is still here, I hope she is.. I'll have to 
> apologise for taking off so suddenly' Teltoli idly wondered. 
> 
> Suddenly an idea popped into her head, and she sat up straight. 
> "Maximize" She whispered, and transformed into her Bot Mode. It was 
> different from last time. While admiring her new form, she suddenly 
> looked up at a bot landed in front of her. 
> 
> "Well another maximal. Well she's kinda cute so I will give you a 
> choice you  can join the alliance or die by my hand." It said.
> 
> 'Uh Oh, think fast and put on a brave front!' Her mind babbled in 
> shock. 'I really hope someone else gets here fast! A maximal!'
> 
> Teltoli raised an eyebrow, and a smile grew across her 
features. "Uh-
> huh... Whatever, I'm not joining those Alliance losers!" Teltoli 
> snorted, then laughed openly in the bots face, her two hands 
hovering 
> near her rapiers in case he really did try attack. But even though 
> she looked ready to fight, a glint of fear showed in her eyes, and 
it 
> really didn't help her position by the fact that she was sitting on 
> the top of her Pod.
> 
> She was shocked, again, as Windlord came to her rescue, standing in 
> front of her bravely. "Wow.." She breathed. Talk about brave! And 
it 
> was a Maximal!
> 
> The bot stood up and walked next to Windlord, her rapiers 
unsheathed 
> and ready to use.
